column2: Releasing Puppet decisions activated
Releasing Puppets
By activating this decision you can check if you can release any puppets you might have at the moment. (NOTE: You need to leave and re-enter the Diplomacy tab for the interface to properly update!)
Releasing Puppets
By activating this decision you can hide the Release Puppet type decisions from the interface. (NOTE: You need to leave and re-enter the Diplomacy tab for the interface to properly update!)
Release Germany
With a democratic government elected/restored, we no longer need to directly intervene in Germany.
